description: Wolf Schlegel of Thoughtworks Germany shares with us his experiences of working with humanitarian open source software designed for help change people’s lives, and shouts out for more developers to get involved in shaping a better world.  Filmed at Devoxx Poland 2016.
short_description: Wolf Schlegel of Thoughtworks Germany shares with us his experiences of working with humanitarian open source software designed
title: Use Your Dev Skills for Good and Help Improve the World
